title: Wiesenlust
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger eatery with bar that's a partner of Slow Food Deutschland program. For each burger variety you choose one of 4 patties (beef, shrimp, vegetarian bulgur-spinach or vegan green spelt-almond). Has salads other snack foods that are vegan suitable. Free Wi-Fi. Opened in 2003.
